# Part VI:  Image processing {#sec-part-ip .unlisted .unnumbered}
{{< include "includes/WIP-callout.qmd" >}}

Intro to processing.

## Image processing topics

* Hardware - Qualcomm, Broadcom type devices for rendering
* Rendering - Algorithms such as demosaic, defective pixel, color transforms, blurring, adaptive
* Image metrics that are for hardware, not necessarily human, such as MTF50.  Some are human related.
